title: Team
introText: For this project Artur Martínez recovers part of the team from the last stage of Capritx and members of other stages. Young professionals committed to their profession and our gastronomic genetics. In addition, professionals of great experience, technique and projection are incorporated.

memberBlocks.name: Pol Ruiz
memberBlocks.title: Chef
memberBlocks.memberText: Joviat, Bardeni, Capritx, Disfrutar, Rasoterra, Sant Pau Tokio, La Taverna del Ciri, Alkimia
memberBlocks.secondMemberText: Creativity Award Catalonia Cooking Contest 2016 (Sant Pau)

memberBlocks.name: Marc Cano
memberBlocks.title: 2nd Chef
memberBlocks.memberText: Cett, Capritx, Sant Pau Tokio, La Taverna del Ciri, Alkimia

memberBlocks.name: Xavi Romero
memberBlocks.title: Kitchen
memberBlocks.memberText: Cavall Bernat, Capritx, Alkimia, Vivanda, Topik

memberBlocks.name: Iván Garcia
memberBlocks.title: Kitchen
memberBlocks.memberText: EHTB, Disfrutar, Els Garrofers, Mint, Zero Zapatero
